overview:
Mr. Loganâ€™s career began as a creative director and marketer in Hollywood in association with 20th Century Fox, CBS, HBO, Columbia Pictures, and Paramount Pictures, among others. He is the recipient of more than 75 RIAA-certified Gold and Platinum records for retail marketing campaigns in the entertainment industry.

Mr. Logan served as Director of Creative and Brand Marketing for Digimarc, playing a key role as the brand evangelist and the establishment of Digimarc as the world leader in digital watermarking technology. He served as the Vice President for Marketing & Communications at Healtheon/WebMD, which as Healtheon (HLTH) enjoyed the largest internet healthcare IPO and in its merger with WebMD the largest pure merger of internet companies at that time.

Mr. Logan next spent four years performing due diligence principally in China as the CMO for Agio Ltd. in the field of satellite communications, mobile technology and services. Mr. Logan served as the CMO for Absorbent Technologies, launching a new agricultural and consumer gardening technology that yielded higher plant yields using less water, and where he licensed the brand and technology to global manufacturers and distributors.

relationships.title: Director of Creative and Brand Marketing
